knimeNode.name: Workflow Input
knimeNode.shortDescription: Receives an input from an external KNIME workflow. For use in workflows that are called from other workflows.

fullDescription.intro: Receives a table or any other port object from a KNIME workflow that calls this workflow using the Subworkflow node.

ports.outPort: Abitrary input provided by a workflow calling this workflow, e.g, using the Call Workflow node. The port can be configured to match the type of data that is to be received on this Workflow Input node.
